author: topix.com
title: Hillary Clinton tweet crushes biotech stocks - KIDK CBS 3
text:
There are 1 comment on the KIDK CBS 3 story from 2 hrs ago, titled Hillary Clinton tweet crushes biotech stocks . In it, KIDK CBS 3 reports that:
Wall Street is already betting that a President Hillary Clinton may not be good for the red-hot biotech industry. Prices had skyrocketed overnight to $750 from just $13.50 each for a drug called Daraprim -- a 62-year-old drug used to treat a life-threatening parasitic infection.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at KIDK CBS 3.
